description.raw:
Currently there are a few problems with our homebrew scripts.

* the `.git` folder is now installed to `/usr/local/Homebrew/.git` instead of `/usr/local/.git`
* building bottles with `test-bot` fails if there are other packages installed, so mercurial is not installed from `_homebrew_cleanup` anymore.

Example failures:

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/163/console
* http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/653/console

Fixed with this branch:

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/ignition_math-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/40/
* http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/72/

title.raw: Move brew cleanup into separate script
